segments.text: I'm really struggling to understand what I'm seeing here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right in a puddle, drying a dish with such concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can a person be so utterly absorbed in such a simple task?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a literal flood happening at her feet, and she shows zero reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to watch her complete lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, practically performing acrobatics to get cookies behind her!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just irresponsible that she hasn't noticed anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a wave of annoyance at her apparent obliviousness to all hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene makes me want to shout and get her attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I mean, come on, the water is overflowing in a visible stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of inattentiveness is truly baffling and frankly, a bit infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a mess waiting to happen, and she's just polishing her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR
